Abstractive Summarization
The pragmatic methods obtain improvements of 0.2-0.5 in ROUGE scores and 0.2-1.8 METEOR over the base S 0 model , with the distractor - based approach SD 1 outperforming the reconstructorbased approach S R 1 .

strong.from sentence: SD 1 is strong across all metrics , obtaining results competitive to the best previous abstractive systems . ( b ) Coverage ratios by attribute type ( columns ) for the base model S0 , and for the pragmatic system SD 1 when constructing the distractor by masking the specified attribute ( rows ) .
